/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and lampposts, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
